# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $10000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $9500. This is a unique chance to secure a high-value item at a discounted rate. I look forward to hearing your response soon. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
